scripts.compile:scripts: if find ./public-scripts -name '*.ts' -print -quit | grep -q .; then tsc -p tsconfig.scripts.json; else echo 'No TypeScript files found in public-scripts folder'; fi
scripts.dev: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:scripts && nodemon --exec ts-node-dev ./src/server.ts
scripts.start: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:scripts && npm run compile:server && node dist/server.js
